structure.unit: ARTICLE XVII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY LOCKSMITH ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 8A-364. Locksmith license.
Unless otherwise exempt pursuant to provisions of this article, no individual shall perform work as a locksmith in Miami-Dade County, Florida, without first obtaining a locksmith license from the Director pursuant to this article and maintaining such license as required herein.
Any individual who performs work as a locksmith in Miami-Dade County, Florida shall obtain a license annually or biannually from the Director.
